Text.Page:
Everyone talks about our victory like it's inevitable, but you know what? Even when we were at peace, Fyrmount was beyond our control.

I swear, I'm the only one worried about a major counterattack. Our defenses are laughable!

I think I can strengthen our defenses using our enemy's strength against them! We could build ramparts out of flamewood from the {@LinkCreature:4#2051#raging arbosks} around here.

Imagine...the enemy scales our walls, then blam! The walls themselves catch fire!

I've got some architectural work ahead of me, but with the raw materials are the hardest part.

Thanks again, .
The {@LinkCreature:4#2051#raging arbosks} are in Blazing Vale, but you probably figured that out already.
